Function reference

Main Workflow Functions

Core functions for running SCM

initialize_covariate_search()
Initialize covariate search state with validation and setup
run_automated_scm_testing()
Execute full automated stepwise covariate modeling workflow from scratch
run_stepwise_covariate_modeling()
Execute complete stepwise covariate modeling algorithm
run_scm_selective_forward()
Execute proper stepwise forward selection with cumulative model building
run_backward_elimination()
Execute backward elimination from a forward selection result

Model Operations

Functions for model creation and modification

add_covariate_to_model()
Add Covariate to Model (FIXED - WITH PROPER LOG FILE SAVING)
remove_covariate_from_model()
Remove covariate using tag name with functional state update
create_retry_model()
Create retry model with modified initial estimates

Evaluation and Selection

Functions for model evaluation and selection

select_best_model()
Evaluate models and select the best one based on statistical criteria
update_model_status_from_files()
Updates search database with results from NONMEM output files
get_param2()
Get Model Parameters and Statistics
get_significant_models_from_step()
Extract models that showed significant improvement in a specific step
get_model_covariates()
Get list of covariates in a model from database
get_model_covariates_from_db()
Get all covariates in a model by tracing hierarchy

Validation

Functions for model validation

validate_base_model_parameters()
Check base model parameter formatting during SCM initialization
validate_parameter_blocks()
Check THETA, OMEGA, and SIGMA block formatting for SCM compatibility
validate_search_inputs()
Validate Search Inputs

State Management

Functions for saving and loading search state

save_search_state()
Save Search State to Models Folder
load_search_state()
Load previously saved search state
discover_existing_models()
Discover existing models and set up relationships

Reporting and Visualization

Functions for generating reports and tables

generate_scm_report()
Create SCM report using existing search database
create_scm_results_table()
Generate comprehensive SCM results table with evaluation comments
view_comprehensive_table()
View Comprehensive Table (UPDATED FOR SIMPLIFIED SCHEMA)
plot_nonmem_iterations()
Plot NONMEM Iteration Data

Monitoring and Reporting

Functions for tracking progress and status

get_model_status_from_files()
Determine overall model status with detailed error reporting
update_all_model_statuses()
Updates all models with robust error handling and concise progress reporting
get_model_status()
Get current status of a model from database

Internal Functions

Internal helper functions (advanced users only)

CovariateSearcher-package CovariateSearcher
CovariateSearcher: Automated Stepwise Covariate Modeling for NONMEM
adjust_theta_for_covariate()
Modify THETA values from 0.1 to -0.1 for specified covariate
analyze_existing_models_yaml()
Update Database with YAML Analysis
analyze_model_covariates_yaml()
Analyze Model Covariates from YAML
analyze_model_from_logic()
Analyze Model Using Logical Rules
calculate_covariate_df()
Determine degrees of freedom based on covariate type
clean_dir()
Remove all files starting with "WK_" from all model subdirectories
create_comprehensive_table()
Create Comprehensive Table (UPDATED FOR SIMPLIFIED SCHEMA - FIXED)
create_model_info_log()
Create detailed log file for model creation
detect_estimation_problems()
Monitor multiple models for estimation problems
discover_existing_models_simple()
Discover Existing Models with YAML Metadata
ensure_base_model_in_database()
Ensure Base Model in Database (FIXED SCHEMA CONSISTENCY)
evaluate_removal_impacts()
Evaluate the impact of removing each covariate
extract_covariate_name_from_tag()
Parse covariate name from tag string
extract_model_params()
Extract Model Parameters from Control File
extract_nonmem_timestamps()
Parse LST file to extract actual NONMEM execution timestamps
extract_params()
Extract Parameters from NONMEM Control File
fix_theta_renumbering()
Renumber THETA parameters after removing some
force_update_models()
Force update one or more models with fresh file reads
generate_changes_display()
Generate Changes Display (NEW FUNCTION FOR CHANGES COLUMN)
generate_phase()
Generate Phase (VECTORIZED VERSION - KEPT FOR COMPATIBILITY)
generate_recovery_report()
Generate comprehensive recovery statistics and summary
generate_step_description()
Generate Step Description (VECTORIZED VERSION)
generate_step_display()
Generate Step Display (NEW FUNCTION FOR STEP COLUMN)
generate_tags_from_covariate_search()
Generate or Update tags.yaml File from Covariate Search Table
get_covariate_tag_from_name()
Convert covariate name back to tag
get_covariates_from_models()
Extract covariate names from specific models
get_dropped_covariates()
Get covariates that were tested but not selected in previous steps
get_excluded_covariates()
Get list of covariates excluded from current step with details
get_fixed_covariates()
Identify covariates with FIX status
get_model_covariates_from_files()
Extract covariates from model using BBR tags
get_model_max_rse()
Extract maximum RSE from model using existing functionality
get_model_ofv_from_database()
Extract OFV from completed model database entry
get_model_parent_yaml()
Get Model Parent from YAML
get_remaining_covariates()
Get list of covariate tags that haven't been tested from base model
handle_failed_retry()
Handle failed retry model by excluding covariate from step
initialize_search_config()
Initialize search configuration parameters
initialize_search_database_core()
Initialize Search Database (SIMPLIFIED SCHEMA)
load_existing_search()
Load existing models and recreate search state
load_search_config()
Load Search Configuration
load_search_data()
Load Search Data
load_tags()
Load covariate tags from YAML configuration
model_add_cov()
Core functionality to add covariate to NONMEM model file with enhanced logging
model_report()
Generate Parameter Table Report for Multiple Models
`%||%`
NULL-coalescing operator
print_parameter_validation()
Display parameter validation results in readable format
print_scm_results_table()
Display SCM results table with RSE and evaluation comments
process_estimation_issues()
Process detected estimation issues with smart retry/exclusion logic
pvalue_to_threshold()
Calculate ΔOFV threshold from p-value for likelihood ratio test
read_ext_file()
Parse .ext files and detect OFV > 10^10 and other estimation problems
read_ext_iterations()
Read NONMEM Extended Output File
read_model_file()
Read NONMEM control file with proper path handling
read_model_yaml()
Read Model Information from YAML
read_nonmem_ext()
Extract OFV and parameters from NONMEM .ext file
read_nonmem_lst()
Robust LST file reader with comprehensive error handling
resume_selective_forward()
Resume SCM selective forward selection workflow from a saved checkpoint
run_univariate_step()
Run Univariate Step (ENHANCED WITH EXCLUSION FILTERING)
submit_and_wait_for_step()
Submit models and wait for all to complete with corrected status tracking
theme_pps_table()
Apply PPS Theme to Flextable
update_model_counter()
Update model counter excluding retry models
update_tags_yaml()
Generate Tags YAML with Search State Integration
validate_setup()
Validate covariate search setup and data consistency
view_exclusion_status()
Display current exclusion status with details
write_model_file()
Write modified NONMEM control file back to disk
